# Python-Pandas
This repository is for me to practice with Python and Pandas. Refer to the Supplemental folder for the necessary downloads.

## Topics Covered
1. Columns
2. Data Cleaning
3. Indexing and Multi-Indexing
4. Pandas Visualization
5. Sorting
6. Group-By
7. Concat

## Financial Topics
1. Returns
2. Standard Deviation
3. Sharpe Ratio
